# Data and modeling

- [Data and modeling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/index.md): View links to articles that describe modeling and how to access data in .NET. The articles cover WCF Data Services, ADO.NET, and transaction processing.

## Topic Indices

- [Adonet](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/adonet/llms.txt): 155 topics, 606 in tree
- [Transactions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/data/transactions/llms.txt): 17 topics
